originalText.text: This was my first time here! I recently moved to the area and thought why not try this place! Linda was professional, kind, and did exactly what I asked for and Iâ€™m very pleased with how it turned out! It was affordable too which was great because most salons in nyc charge insane prices for nails. The photo below are acrylic extensions with french tip design.

originalText.text:
Place is very dirty. They use the same dirty towel over and over for a pedicure. They barely clean the bowls after a customerâ€™s feet has been in it.

Also Just received the ugliest full set Iâ€™ve ever had in my life. $100 of my hard earned money  wasted.  DO NOT COME HERE

originalText.text:
I booked for a gel mani & pedi, was charged an extra $20 for gel removal which Iâ€™ve never experienced before. There was no notice to remove it before hand and gel removal is usually $5 tops. My natural nails were over drilled by the lovely lady who unfortunately was not trained or qualified to do this job.

They had an apprentice do my gel manicure who had little clue of what they were doing. They were not doing my design correctly and the manager had to take over after closing time to fix it.

When I got home, I noticed my gel pedi had bubbles under the polish and came off the next day. They did offer a redo, but this had never happened to me before.

I ended up paying an extra $50 from my initial charge / deal for a pretty stressful experience.

I was going overseas for over two weeks the following day, so to say the least it was an unpleasant and disappointing experience. Not worth the price ðŸ˜”

originalText.text:
I completely love this place. Tina is BOMB ok. Great service. Cool atmosphere. They do charge you for the massage chair when getting a pedi which is new to me but whatever.  Just wont use it lol.

These are my real nails with the exception of 2..thin layer of acrylic and clear gel polish.

Other than that everything is awesome and you can make an appt and you are seated without waiting. I'm all with it and won't be going anywhere else.

originalText.text:
They arenâ€™t bad but they arenâ€™t amazing. In my opinion itâ€™s not worth the price ($93).
If you do come here be prepared to be here for a while! I had a 2:30 appointment for a gel mani pedi and didnâ€™t leave until 5pm. If you plan on paying by card do so BEFORE the treatment because they shut off the card machine at 5pm and will do so even if youâ€™re still there and told them you wanted to pay by card.
